oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Various record and radio excerpts
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Various recordings of performances featuring various performers, mainly pertaining to Virgil Simmons and Paul Byrd.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Paul Byrd; Virgil Simmons; Tommy Magness
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Test tones -- Tiger Rag (Paul Byrd) -- Paddy On The Turnpike (Virgil Simmons) -- Arkansas Traveler ([Unidentified]) -- Fire On The Mountain (Virgil Simmons) -- Devil's Dream (Virgil Simmons) -- Nola (Paul Byrd) -- St. Louis Blues (Paul Byrd) -- [Unidentified tune] -- Done Gone (Virgil Simmons) -- Dragging The Bow (Virgil Simmons) -- Sally Goodwin (Tommy Magness) -- Twinkle Twinkle Little Star (Virgil Simmons) -- Alabama Jubilee (Tommy Magness) -- It Pays To Be Ignorant comedy radio program (various) -- Nobody's Sweetheart Now (Paul Byrd) -- Twelfth Street Rag (Paul Byrd) -- Tiger Rag (Paul Byrd) -- Alabama Gal (Paul Byrd) -- Steel Guitar Rag (Paul Byrd) -- Arkansas Traveler (Virgil Simmons) -- Twinkle Twinkle Little Star (Virgil Simmons) -- Sweet Georgia Brown (Paul Byrd) -- Ragtime Annie (Virgil Simmons) -- Red Wing (Virgil Simmons) -- Flop Eared Mule (Virgil Simmons) -- Paddy On The Turnpike (Virgil Simmons) -- Ida Red (Virgil Simmons) -- John Henry (Virgil Simmons) -- Soldiers Joy (Virgil Simmons) -- Mockingbird (Virgil Simmons) -- Marmaduke's Hornpipe (Virgil Simmons) -- Blue Ridge Mountain Home (Paul Byrd) -- Smokey Mountain Rag (Virgil Simmons) -- Grey Eagle (Virgil Simmons) -- Flop Eared Mule (Virgil Simmons) -- Nola (Paul Byrd) -- Paddy On The Turnpike ([Unidentified]) -- Ding Dong Daddy (Paul Byrd) [unconfirmed] -- Dill Pickle Rag (Virgil Simmons) -- Turkey In The Straw (Virgil Simmons) -- [Unidentified tune]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: Magness, Tommy;
